title.value: Комплекс средств малой механизации для оценки состояния качества, очистки и промывки закрытой дренажной сети
Complex of means of small-scale mechanization for an assessment of a condition of quality, cleaning and washing of a drainage network

person.name: Latushkina, G.V., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)
Levin, G.Yu., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Arable Farming (Belarus). Institute for Land Reclamation

abstract.value: For maintenance of closed drainage network in working status it is necessary to carry out its systematic technical support. Well-timed repair works determine accident-free work of ameliorative systems and development of comfortable conditions for agricultural producing on drained lands. The article presents a complex of the means of small-scaled mechanization for evaluation of the status of the quality of cleaning and washing-up of the closed drainage network. The complex of the technical means has been developed in the conditions of the Institute for Land Reclamation. Utilization of the suggested technical devices promotes valuable declining of the self-cost and labour consumption of the works aimed on technical maintenance of drainage systems. Technical characteristics of the devices are presented; photographs of the different constructions for closed drainage system's cleaning and washing up are displayed. The most important advantages of the suggested technical means are enumerated.
